message.body: Where are you guys?

Hey ##### I'm not gonna make to the pier. I have early Passover Dinner I have to go to and won't have enough time to make it there in back to leave fire the east side at 3pm. Let's do something tomorrow.
Sounds good.
Ok man. No problem, we can do something tomorrow but if we don't I think I'll be back in June
Thanks! Exodus
Happy Passover man
Hey Yaron tomorrow we going to a Cuban cafe on sunset for breakfast, then downtown for a bit then after then who knows?! Join us if you are available
Good morning! When are you heading downtown?
Hey, we will be there around 1130
Wana meet up for a bit
Totally. Where were you thinking of going?
We have to pick up a broken phone at 3rd and Los Angeles then whatever
Ok. I'm heading over to the Moca at grand to drop off something
We had a minor change of plans because the phone wasn't ready yet
Ok.
But we are heading downtown
But it won't be until a couple hrs later
Oh. Where you guys now? Maybe I can come there after I drop off this thing at moca.
Currently on sunset in silver lake, but we are moving around taking on a few errands. We will likely be heading back to Salano Canyon shortly.
Ok, we are going back to the house, we will be there in 20 mins. The address is ############### it's super close to Dogers stadium
On my way be there in 10
